snippet: The Obama administration’s announcement touched off none of the rancor over “death panels” that came up during debate on the Affordable Care Act in 2009.
abstract: Obama administration issues final rule authorizing Medicare to pay doctors for carrying out end-of-life planning with patients; subject touched off 'death panels' rancor when it was introduced in 2009.

lead_paragraph: The Obama administration’s announcement touched off none of the rancor over “death panels” that came up during debate on the Affordable Care Act in 2009.

headline.print_headline: New Medicare Rule Authorizes End-of-Life Consultations
